structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text: A charter county government may provide a retirement system for its employees only by participating in the County Employees Retirement System pursuant to KRS 78.510 to 78.852.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990.
